    Mesh2 Mesh2.clean()
    Removes elements from the coordinate, texture coordinate and normal arrays of the mesh which are not visited by the face indices.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.collapseEdge​(int faceIndex, int edgeIndex)
    Collapses an edge to a point.

    Removes a given number of face indices from this mesh beginning at an index.

    Removes a given number of face indices from this mesh beginning at an index.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.deleteVerts​(int faceIndex, int vertIndex, int count)
    Removes a given number of vertex indices from this mesh beginning at an index.
    static Mesh2[] Mesh2.detachFaces​(Mesh2 source)
    Creates an array of meshes, each with one face from the source mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.extrudeEdge​(int faceIndex, int edgeIndex, float amount)
    Extrudes an edge, creating a new quadrilateral tangent to the edge.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.extrudeEdges​(int faceIndex, float amount)
    Extrudes all edges of a face, creating new tangential quadrilaterals.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.flipU()
    Negates the x component of all texture coordinates (u) in the mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.flipV()
    Negates the y component of all texture coordinates (v) in the mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.flipX()
    Negates the x component of all coordinates in the mesh, then reverses the mesh's faces.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.flipY()
    Negates the y component of all coordinates in the mesh, then reverses the mesh's faces.

    Converts an array of curves to a mesh.

    Converts a curve to a mesh.

    Gets a mesh from this mesh entity.

    Groups separate meshes with the same material index into a mesh.

    Mesh2 Mesh2.insetFace​(int faceIndex)
    Insets a face by calculating its center then easing from the face's vertices toward the center by 0.5.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.insetFace​(int faceIndex, float fac)
    Insets a face by calculating its center then easing from the face's vertices toward the center by the factor.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.insetFaces()
    Insets all faces in the mesh once.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.insetFaces​(int itr)
    Insets all faces in the mesh for a given number of iterations by a factor of 0.5 .
    Mesh2 Mesh2.insetFaces​(int itr, float fac)
    Insets all faces in the mesh for a given number of iterations by a factor in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Mesh2 Mesh2.plane​(int cols, int rows, Mesh2 target)
    Creates a subdivided plane.
    static Mesh2 Mesh2.plane​(int cols, int rows, PolyType poly, Mesh2 target)
    Creates a plane subdivided into either triangles or quadrilaterals, depending on the polygon type.

    static Mesh2 Mesh3.project​(Mesh3 source, Mat4 projection, Mat4 camera, Mesh2 target)
    Projects a 3D mesh onto a 2D surface, returning the 2D mesh projection.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.reframe​(Transform2 tr)
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .
    Mesh2 MeshEntity2.removeAt​(int i)
    Removes a mesh at a given index.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the z axis.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.roundCorner​(int faceIdx, int cornerIdx, float radius)
    Rounds a corner to an arc with a given radius.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.roundCorner​(int faceIdx, int cornerIdx, float radius, int count)
    Rounds a corner to an arc with a given radius.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.roundCorners​(int faceIdx, float radius)
    Rounds all the corners of a face in a mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.roundCorners​(int faceIdx, float radius, int count)
    Rounds all the corners of a face in a mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a uniform scalar.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a non-uniform scalar.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.sectionFaces​(Ray2 ray)
    Splits a mesh's faces according to entry and exit intersections with a ray.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.set​(int[][][] faces, Vec2[] coords, Vec2[] texCoords)
    Sets the mesh's data by reference, not by value.

    Sets this mesh to a copy of the source.

    Creates a square.
    static Mesh2 Mesh2.square​(PolyType poly, Mesh2 target)
    Creates a square.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivEdge​(int faceIndex, int edgeIndex)
    Subdivides an edge by a cut at its midpoint.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivEdge​(int faceIndex, int edgeIndex, int cuts)
    Subdivides an edge by the number of cuts given.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFace​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFaceCenter​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by calculating its center, cutting each of its edges once to create a midpoint, then connecting the midpoints to the center.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFaceFan​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by calculating its center, then connecting its vertices to the center.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFaceInscribe​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by cutting each of its edges once to create a midpoint, then connecting each midpoint.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFaces()
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh once.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFaces​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFacesCenter​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFacesFan​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.subdivFacesInscribe​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    static Mesh2 Mesh3.textureMap​(Mesh3 source, Mesh2 target)
    Creates a flat representation of a a mesh's texture coordinates as a net, or map.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.toOrigin​(Transform2 tr)
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point.
    static Mesh2 Mesh2.tracePerimeter​(Mesh2 source, int count, float offset, Mesh2 target)
    Traces the perimeter of each face of the source mesh.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.transform​(Mat3 m)
    Transforms all coordinates in the mesh by a matrix.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.transform​(Transform2 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the mesh permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a mesh entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple mesh entities into one mesh entity.
    Mesh2 Mesh2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the mesh by a vector.
    static Mesh2 Mesh2.uniformData​(Mesh2 source, Mesh2 target)
    Restructures the mesh so that each face index refers to unique data, indifferent to redundancies.

    java.util.Iterator<Mesh2> MeshEntity2.iterator()
    Returns an iterator, which allows an enhanced for-loop to access the meshes in the mesh entity.
